documents.text:
--- Visit 1 | Date: 2025-06-09 ---

Follow-up visit #1 for patient SB-P005.

On exam, BP is 95/91, pulse 71, wt 84.5 kg. Patient appears well-appearing, cooperative with exam.

Labs drawn today:
  - PSA: 10.67 ng/mL [ref 0.0-4.0] (HIGH)
  - ALT: 18.86 U/L [ref 7.0-56.0]
  - AST: 16.29 U/L [ref 10.0-40.0]
  - Hemoglobin: 12.56 g/dL [ref 12.0-17.5]
  - WBC: 8.15 10^3/uL [ref 4.5-11.0]
  - Creatinine: 0.55 mg/dL [ref 0.7-1.3] (LOW)

Plan: Continue current regimen. Follow up in 3 weeks.

--- Visit 2 | Date: 2025-06-30 ---

Visit 2 clinical encounter for SB-P005.

Vital signs obtained: blood pressure 112/95, heart rate 74, weight 83.0 kg.

Routine labs obtained:
  - PSA: 10.01 ng/mL [ref 0.0-4.0] (HIGH)
  - ALT: 21.88 U/L [ref 7.0-56.0]
  - AST: 16.4 U/L [ref 10.0-40.0]
  - Hemoglobin: 12.34 g/dL [ref 12.0-17.5]
  - WBC: 8.84 10^3/uL [ref 4.5-11.0]
  - Creatinine: 0.62 mg/dL [ref 0.7-1.3] (LOW)

Imaging assessment (CT chest/abdomen/pelvis): Complete response — no measurable disease identified. All previously noted target lesions have resolved. Classified as CR per RECIST 1.1.

PSA now 0.22 ng/mL — decrease 93.6% from initial value.

Plan: Continue therapy per protocol with supportive medications. Return for cycle 3 in 3 weeks.

--- Visit 3 | Date: 2025-07-21 ---

Patient SB-P005 presents for scheduled cycle 3 visit.

VS: 86/96 | HR 78 | Wt 87.1 kg. Patient slightly pale but hemodynamically stable.

New AE: Arthralgia. Severity: moderate (Grade 2). Onset: day 58. Resolved with sequelae by day 88. Relatedness: possible. No dose modification required.

Routine labs obtained:
  - PSA: 11.21 ng/mL [ref 0.0-4.0] (HIGH)
  - ALT: 22.7 U/L [ref 7.0-56.0]
  - AST: 17.75 U/L [ref 10.0-40.0]
  - Hemoglobin: 12.14 g/dL [ref 12.0-17.5]
  - WBC: 8.08 10^3/uL [ref 4.5-11.0]
  - Creatinine: 0.64 mg/dL [ref 0.7-1.3] (LOW)

Plan: Continue therapy per protocol with supportive medications. Return for cycle 4 in 3 weeks.

--- Visit 4 | Date: 2025-08-11 ---

Patient SB-P005 presents for scheduled cycle 4 visit.

Vital signs obtained: blood pressure 124/89, heart rate 59, weight 84.4 kg.

Laboratory results:
  - PSA: 9.99 ng/mL [ref 0.0-4.0] (HIGH)
  - ALT: 21.84 U/L [ref 7.0-56.0]
  - AST: 18.58 U/L [ref 10.0-40.0]
  - Hemoglobin: 11.8 g/dL [ref 12.0-17.5] (LOW)
  - WBC: 7.72 10^3/uL [ref 4.5-11.0]
  - Creatinine: 0.61 mg/dL [ref 0.7-1.3] (LOW)

Restaging CT shows stable disease. Target lesions within +/-15% of prior measurements. No new lesions. RECIST: SD.

PSA level is 2.95 ng/mL (decrease 15.0% from baseline).

Assessment: Tolerating therapy. Plan to continue protocol. Next visit in 3 weeks.

--- Visit 5 | Date: 2025-09-01 ---

Visit 5 — MISSED. Patient called to reschedule but did not attend. unable to reach patient.

Patient removed from study protocol following confirmed disease progression on latest imaging. Referred to alternate treatment pathway.

--- Visit 6 | Date: 2025-09-22 ---

Visit 6 — MISSED. Patient called to reschedule but did not attend. spoke with patient, rescheduling.

--- Visit 7 | Date: 2025-10-13 ---

No-show for cycle 7 visit. Staff attempted follow-up: spoke with patient, rescheduling.

--- Visit 8 | Date: 2025-11-03 ---

Scheduled visit 8 was not completed. spoke with patient, rescheduling.
